metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7299 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.28, has an invalid read (of size 8) because the code to emit relocs (bfd_elf_final_link function in bfd/elflink.c) does not check the format of the input file before trying to read the ELF reloc section header. The vulnerability leads to a GNU linker (ld) program crash.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
